SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.internal

Interface OAuth2SessionRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<OAuth2Session,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OAuth2Session,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<OAuth2Session,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<OAuth2Session,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<OAuth2Session,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<OAuth2Session>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<OAuth2Session,Long>
@Repository public interface OAuth2SessionRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OAuth2Session,Long>
Repository for OAuth2Session entities. Manages OAuth2 authentication sessions.

      Find sessions that need refresh

      @Query("SELECT s FROM OAuth2Session s WHERE s.createdFromUserAgent LIKE %:pattern%") List<OAuth2Session> findByUserAgentPattern(@Param("pattern") String pattern)
      Find sessions by user agent pattern

    • getSessionStatsByProvider

      @Query("SELECT s.provider, COUNT(s), COUNT(CASE WHEN s.isActive = true THEN 1 END), COUNT(CASE WHEN s.terminatedAt IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) FROM OAuth2Session s GROUP BY s.provider") List<Object[]> getSessionStatsByProvider()
      Get session statistics by provider

    • findLongRunningSessions

      @Query("SELECT s FROM OAuth2Session s WHERE s.isActive = true AND s.createdAt < :threshold ORDER BY s.createdAt ASC") List<OAuth2Session> findLongRunningSessions(@Param("threshold") Instant threshold)
      Find long-running sessions

    • updateLastAccessed

      @Query("UPDATE OAuth2Session s SET s.lastAccessedAt = :now, s.lastAccessedFromIp = :ip WHERE s.sessionId = :sessionId") void updateLastAccessed(@Param("sessionId") String sessionId, @Param("now") Instant now, @Param("ip") String ip)
      Update last accessed timestamp for a session
